entry.title: Electrum 2.0 has been tagged
entry.summary: The context is a request for someone to fix their message threading as it is broken. The person making the request asks that the recipient ensure that their mail program uses the correct message ID when replying. This will help improve the organization and tracking of messages within the thread.Message threading refers to the way email messages are organized and grouped together based on the subject line or other identifying information. When message threading is broken, it can make it difficult to follow the conversation and keep track of which messages have been read or replied to.Using the correct message ID when replying is important because it helps the email program correctly identify which messages are part of the same thread. This ensures that all related messages are grouped together and displayed in the correct order.Overall, fixing broken message threading and ensuring that the correct message ID is used when replying are important steps in improving the organization and clarity of email conversations.
